language.DIC_ALL_CHANNELS_VIEW_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to browse 15 days of TV Guide listings in a grid
language.DIC_GENRE_VIEW_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to view TV Guide listings for a specific genre (e.g. movies, sports, kids)
language.DIC_SINGLE_CHANNEL_VIEW_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to view TV Guide listings for a specific channel
language.DIC_SUGGESTED_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to discover personalized recommendations for Movies and TV Programmes
language.DIC_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Drücken Sie auf OK, um die Horizon-Box und Ihre persönlichen Einstellungen zu verändern
language.DIC_CUSTOMER_CARE_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to access Horizon Help and Frequently Asked Questions
language.DIC_SEARCH_KEYWORD_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to search TV programmes, recordings and On Demand by keyword
language.DIC_SEARCH_KEYWORD_DES_WITHOUT_PVR: Press OK to search TV programmes and On Demand by keyword
language.DIC_ON_DEMAND_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to browse thousands of hours of On Demand and Catch Up TV
language.DIC_LIBRARY_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to access your DVR recordings, Home Network Content and purchased On Demand
language.DIC_LIBRARY_DESCRIPTION_WITHOUT_PVR: Press OK to access your Home Network Content and purchased On Demand

language.DIC_PIN_CODE_BLOCKED_MSG_L1: You've entered three incorrect PIN CODES

language.DIC_PURCHASE_CONFIRM_MSG: To view this programme, please press OK to buy it
language.DIC_PROG_SUMMARY_UNAVAILABLE: Sorry, there's no programme summary available
language.DIC_OPTION_NOT_VALID: This option is no longer valid. Please press BACK and try again.
language.DIC_MEMO_CONFIRMATION: You'll be reminded when this programme starts
language.DIC_REMOVE_MEMO: This programme reminder has been deleted
language.DIC_FAV_CONFIRMATION: This channel is now a favourite, it will appear at the top of the channel lineup. You can manage and reorder your favourite channels in TOOLBOX.
language.DIC_STOP_CURRENT_RECORDING_CONFIRM_MSG: Would you like to stop recording this programme?
language.DIC_ENTITLEMENT_EXPIRING: Your subscription will expire soon. Please go to CUSTOMER CARE for more information.
language.DIC_TELETEXT_ERROR_MSG: There is no teletext available for this programme
language.DIC_STANDBY_AUTOMATIC_TIMEOUT_TITLE: You have not used your box for a while. It will now switch to standby to save power.
language.DIC_ALARM_POPUP_NOTIF_REMINDER_NOTIF: Press OK to watch or BACK to cancel
language.DIC_NO_ENTITLEMENT_MESSAGE: Please contact us to subscribe to this channel
language.DIC_STANBY_NETWORK_WARNING_MESSAGE: While in standby, your box will not be able to manage your network and it can stop working. Press OK to proceed, BACK to abort.
language.DIC_BOOKING_IN_PROGRESS: Booking process is searching for all episodes of the season. It will continue booking episodes after the dismissal of this notification.
language.DIC_FAV_MODE_ACTIVATED: The favourite mode is now activated
language.DIC_FAV_MODE_DEACTIVATED: The favourite mode is now deactivated
language.DIC_REMOVE_FAV_CONFIRM_MSG: The list only contains two favourite channels. Removing one of them will deactivate favourites mode. Do you want to proceed?
language.DIC_DEACTIVATE_FAVOURITE_MODE: Please be aware that you are now deactivating the favourites mode
language.DIC_REPLAY_FROM_START_NOT_ALLOWED: Sorry, Replay From Start is not allowed for this content
language.DIC_MEDIA_CENTRE_DISABLE_MSG:
Do you want to disable the home media catalogue?
Once disabled, your home media content will still be available via MY DEVICES in the LIBRARY.
language.DIC_REPLAY_NOT_AVAILABLE: Your Replay option is not available anymore
language.DIC_REPLAY_NOT_AVAILABLE_IN_PASTGRID: The Replay TV schedule is not able to be retrieved at the moment. TV Guide will change to current broadcast programme.

language.DIC_LIBRAY_NOTIF_NO_RECO_PROGS: You haven't recorded any programmes yet. You can record programmes in the TV GUIDE.
language.DIC_LIBRAY_NOTIF_NO_RECO_VIDEOS: There are no videos in your library or home network. You can record programmes in the TV GUIDE or set up a home network in SETTINGS.
language.DIC_LIBRAY_NOTIF_NO_INSTAL_APPS: Apps are currently not available, please try again later.
language.DIC_LIBRAY_NOTIF_NO_DEVICES: There are no connected devices, or your home network hasn't been set up. You can set up a home network in SETTINGS.

language.DIC_STORE_BUY_TC_MSG: Buying terms & conditions Accounts are billed and payable one month in advance. A late fee will be applied to all overdue accounts. Prices for services are not guaranteed for the entire billing period.

language.DIC_UPC_FORU_EXPERT_RECOM: The best TV programmes and movies selected by our experts
language.DIC_OPT_OUT_RECO_ENGINE: Would you like Horizon to create personalised suggestions, for you?
language.DIC_START_TEST: This test will check if your box is correctly connected to the UPC network and your in-home connection is working. Do you want to begin?
language.DIC_IP_CONNECTION_OK_MESSAGE: Your IP connection is correctly configured
language.DIC_DOCSIS_CONNECTION_OK_MSG: Your DOCSIS cable modem is functioning correctly
language.DIC_WAN_CONNECTION_OK_MSG: Your WAN connection is functioning correctly
language.DIC_WAIT_MSG: Please wait while the tests are performed
language.DIC_FIRST_INSTALL_LEGAL_DISCLAIMER_MSG:
Horizon TV is designed to learn your viewing preferences over time and recommend the TV that you will enjoy the most.
Your viewing history will be kept private, adult viewing will never be stored, and we will not sell your personal data to anyone. For more information, please see the FAQs or our Privacy Policy on www.horizon.tv.
Select ACCEPT below to confirm the use of this feature now. You can easily turn this feature OFF or ON at any time via the TOOLBOX menu
language.DIC_DIC_DOWNLOAD_ON_GOING: Please wait. The download is ongoing…
language.DIC_CRITICAL_UPDATE: This is a critical update, please wait until the download is finished
language.DIC_INTERRUPT_UPDATE: Are you sure you want to interrupt the update ?
language.DIC_DOWNLOAD_COMPLETE: Download is complete. Would you like to install the update now or update the next time your box is in standby?
language.DIC_STANDBY_POWER_CONSUM_MSG:
In order to reduce the overall power consumption of Set-Top-Boxes, the Standby Power Usage setting of this Horizon TV box has been set to MEDIUM.
With this setting, the bootup time to activate the box from Standby to Active can be long.
You can always go to Settings – Power Management to change the setting later.
Would you like to change the setting to HIGH to make use of (the) faster boot-up right now? If yes, please select ACCEPT.
language.DIC_STANDBY_POWER_CONSUM_LOW_MSG:
In order to reduce the overall power consumption of Set-Top-Boxes, the Standby Power Usage setting of this Horizon TV box has been set to LOW.
With this setting, the bootup time to activate the box from Standby to Active can be long.
You can always go to Settings – Power Management to change the setting later.
Would you like to change the setting to HIGH to make use of (the) faster boot-up right now? If yes, please select ACCEPT.
language.DIC_STANDBY_POWER_CONSUM_WARNING_MSG:
Your Horizon mediabox is almost ready to go! All you need to do now is decide if you want to keep internet, wifi and/or telephony switched on at all times.
If you use the Horizon mediabox for these services, select YES from the options below. In this mode, the mediabox takes only a few seconds to wake up from standby.
By default, your mediabox is configured in ‘eco mode’. In this mode the mediabox consumes less energy. However internet, wifi or telephony will not be available in this mode if your mediabox is in standby. To use this mode, select NO from the options below.
You can always change the power settings later by going to the ‘Settings’ menu.
language.DIC_IP_NUM_OF_CONNECTED: Number of connected Horizon extra boxes

language.DIC_PIN_AND_PARENTAL_CONTROL_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to modify Pin and Parental Control code
language.DIC_HOME_NETWORK_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to modify home network set up
language.DIC_ADVANCED_SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to modify AV advanced settings
language.DIC_DIAGNOSTICS_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to access Horizon box diagnostics
language.DIC_DEFAULT_FAV_ORDER_MSG: REORDER YOUR FAVORITES BY CHANNEL NUMBER ?
language.DIC_SETTINGS_UPDATE_SEARCH_MSG: Please wait while your box is checking for new software
language.DIC_UPDATE_AVAILABLE_DESCRIPTION: There is a newer version of the box software available
language.DIC_UPDATE_AVAILABLE_QUERY: Would you like to install the update now or update the next time your box is in standby?
language.DIC_SETTINGS_UPDATE_FOUND_MANDATORY_MSG: A software update is required. Your box will begin the update process now.
language.DIC_SETTINGS_UPDATE_NOT_FOUND_MSG: The software on your box is the most recent version. You don't need an update.
language.DIC_SETTINGS_UPDATE_UPTODATE_MSG: The software on your box is the most recent version. You don't need an update
language.DIC_KEEP_RECORDED_CONTENT: Would you like to save your existing recordings? If you select no, your recordings will be deleted.
language.DIC_SETTINGS_FACTORY_RESET_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to revert to the factory settings?
language.DIC_TIMER_CONFLICT_FACTORY_RESET_MSG: You cannot restore the factory settings at this moment, because you are currently recording or will start recording within an hour. Please stop the recording or wait until it has finished and try again.
language.HDD_FAILURE_FORMAT_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete all the existing recordings from your library?
language.DIC_SETTINGS_TIME_WINDOW_ERROR_MESSAGE: Start and end time cannot be equal
language.DIC_PAIRING_GENERIC_EXP:
To add a new remote, press the pairing key on our remote control for 10 seconds.
The pairing key is the key on the keyboard side with 2 arrows that follow each other.
language.DIC_CPE_IN_PAIRING_MODE:
To add a new remote, press the following remote control keyboard buttons at the same time:
Fn + ENTER + P
Then press any other button on the remote to connect with this box.
language.DIC_REMOTE_CONTROLE_NOT_PAIRED: The remote control and box connection has failed. Please try again.
language.DIC_ADVANCE_NETWORK_SETTINGS_MSG: TO ACCESS ADVANCE NETWORK SETTINGS, CONNECT TO ETHERNET AND POINT YOUR BROWSER AT gwlogin.net
language.DIC_SETTINGS_OPTION_CONFIRM_MSG1: Would you like to keep this setting?
language.DIC_SETTINGS_OPTION_CONFIRM_MSG2: seconds left before the box returns to the previous setting.
language.DIC_RESTORE_DEFAULT_SETTINGS: Are you sure you want to apply the default settings?
language.DIC_SETTINGS_NEW_PIN_REQUEST: Please enter your new PIN CODE
language.DIC_CONFIRM_REVERT_SOUNDTRACK_SETTINGS: Are you sure you want to revert to the default soundtrack settings?
language.DIC_CONFIRM_REVERT_SUBTITLE_SETTINGS: Are you sure you want to revert to the default subtitle settings?
language.DIC_CONFIRM_REVERT_ACCESSIBILTY_SETTINGS: Are you sure you want to revert to the default accessibility settings?
language.DIC_USER_SETTINGS: Do you want to keep your current user settings, or revert back to default values ?
language.DIC_RENUMBER_FAV_MODIFY_MSG: Select the channel you'd like to move and renumber
language.DIC_RENUMBER_FAV_CONFIRM_POSITION_MSG: Please move the channel to its new number position and press OK
language.DIC_MCW_TERMS_MSG:
The media catalogue is a list of your music and video files that can be played on the TV. If activated, the box will scan connected devices for relevant media and create a catalogue of playable files. This could take some time depending on the number of connected devices and media files.
If you choose not activate the media catalogue, you will only be able to access your home media content via MY DEVICES in your MY LIBRARY.
Press BACK to return.
language.DIC_MCW_LIST_MSG:
This is a list of your currently connected devices.
You will be notified when new devices are connected. Select CONTINUE.
language.DIC_MCW_ENABLE_MSG:
Would you like your Horizon box to create a catalogue of the music and videos stored on your home network? This will make it easier and quicker to find and play your home network content.
Select YES to turn this on and complete the setup process. Otherwise, select QUIT to finish the setup with catalogue disabled.
language.DIC_MCW_REBUILD_MSG: Select REFRESH to update the list of music and video files that can be played on your TV. This will also refresh the cover art and synopsis info for your movies and TV shows. This process will run in the background and may take a while to complete.
language.DIC_NW_IFACE_MSG: Please choose how you would like to connect this box to your existing home network
language.DIC_CONNECT_IP_TO_GATWAY: Please select the connection for the Horizon Extra Box to connect to the Horizon HD Box using a cabled or wireless connection.
language.DIC_IP_FIRST_INSTALL_MSG: Please go to the Horizon HD Box, make sure it is switched on. To allow installation for the Horizon Extra Box, go to Go to TOOLBOX > ADVANCED SETTINGS > HORIZON BOX and press HORIZON EXTRA BOX INSTALL MODE
language.DIC_IP_INSTALLATION_MODE: Soon: Horizon Extra Box INSTALL MODE
language.DIC_IP_INSTALLATION_SUCCESSFULL: Your Horizon Extra Box is successfully installed
language.DIC_IP_INSTALLATION_NOT_SUCCESSFULL: Exiting from Horizon Extra Box installation mode. Installation was not complete.
language.DIC_PIN_CODE_NO_COMPLIANT_RULE: Sorry that pin code entered is not compliant with the rules.
language.DIC_VGW_IP_INST_MODE: Your Horizon HD Box is now in Horizon Extra Box installation mode for the next [10] minutes. Horizon Extra Box connected via MoCA might lose connection to the Horizon HD Box while installation mode is active.
language.DIC_UN_PAIR_ALL_IP_CLIENTS: SOON: UN-PAIR ALL Horizon Extra Boxes
language.DIC_UN_PAIR_ALL_INSTRUC_MSG:
Horizon HD Box is about to un-pair all your Horizon Extra Boxes. You can re-pair the Horizon Extra Boxes by re-installing the Extra Boxes.
Press Continue to un-pair or Cancel.
language.DIC_UN_PAIR_ALL_IP_SUCCESS: Un-pairing all the Horizon Extra Boxes has been completed successfully.
language.DIC_FAILED_TO_COM_WITH_VGW: Failed to communicate with the Horizon HD Box This Horizon Extra Box is now in blocked mode.
language.DIC_NOT_AUTHORIZED_FOR_IPC: To use Extra Horizon Boxes in your home, you must call UPC to upgrade your subscription with support for client boxes.
language.DIC_AUTHORIZED_FOR_ONE_IPC: Currently one Horizon Extra box is running. Your subscription allows max. one Horizon Extra box active at same time in your home. Turn off the active Extra box then activate this box, or you can call UPC to upgrade your subscription to support more extra boxes.
language.DIC_AUTHORIZED_FOR_TWO_IPC: Currently two Horizon Extra Boxes are running. Your subscription allows max. two Horizon Extra boxes active at same time in your home. Turn off one of the active Extra boxes then activate this box.
language.DIC_NW_WIFIMODE_MSG:
If you choose to connect via ETHERNET plug in your cable now and select ETHERNET.
If you choose to connect via WIRELESS select your network from the list on the following screen.
language.DIC_NW_SSID_MSG: Please select your wireless network from this list. It may take a moment to show all networks.
language.DIC_NW_GOTO_MEDIA_CENTER_MSG:
Your box is successfully connected to your home network.
Please select SET UP HOME MEDIA to complete the setup process.
language.DIC_APPLY_NETWORK_SETTINGS_CONFIRM_MSG: Are you sure you want to apply the new settings?
language.DIC_NW_SETTINGS_REBOOT_MSG:
Your box needs to restart to apply the new settings. Your Internet and phone connections may be temporarily interrupted.
Restart now?
language.DIC_NW_SETTINGS_WAIT_MSG: Please wait while the new settings are applied
language.DIC_APPLY_SUCCESS_MSG: The new settings have been successfully applied
language.DIC_SETTING_WIFI_PBC_SCANNING_MSG:
Your Horizon box is ready to pair using push button configuration (WPS PBC).
Please press the WPS button on the device you want to connect within two minutes.
language.DIC_SETTING_WIFI_PBC_PAIRED_MSG: You are successfully connected to the Wi-Fi access point of the box. Your device can now access your home network and the Internet.
language.DIC_SETTING_WIFI_PBC_RETRY_MSG: Your box couldn't detect any devices. Please make sure your device is compatible with push button configuration (WPS PBC) and try again.
language.DIC_WIFI_ENTER_AUTH_KEY: Please enter a password for your network
language.DIC_SETTINGS_RESET_AP_SETTINGS_CONFIRMAT: Are you sure you want to revert to the default access point settings?
language.DIC_NET_NEEDS_PWD_MSG: You've selected a password protected network
language.DIC_APPLY_SETTINGS_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to apply the new settings?
language.DIC_NET_DISCARD_MSG: Are you sure you want to discard the changes you have made?
language.DIC_HN_WIZARD_INSTR: Would you like to set up the Internet and home network connections on your box? This will allow you to access the videos, music and photos stored on devices connected to your home network.
language.DIC_NW_WIZARD_MSG:
How would you like to use the Horizon box?
Select CREATE NETWORK to create a new network and connect other devices using ethernet or WI-FI.
Select JOIN NETWORK to connect this box to an existing home network.
language.DIC_NW_WIZARD_NO_WIFI_MSG: Select the role of this Box. Is it the main server or one of the clients?
language.DIC_CONNECT_BOX_MSG:
Congratulations! Your home network is set up.
Connect wireless devices using the network name below and the password printed on the bottom of your Horizon box. Alternatively, you can use an ethernet cable.
Select below to set up your home media including movies, videos and photos.
language.DIC_CONNECT_BOX_NO_WIFI_MSG: PLEASE CONNECT YOUR DEVICES TO THE BOX, USING THE FOLLOWING INFO:
language.DIC_NW_FAILURE_MSG:
Your box couldn't connect to your home network.
The home network set-up will now stop and your box will return to its previous settings.

language.DIC_ALPHA_KEYPAD_LOWER_CASE_LETTERS: a b c d e f g h i j k l m n o p q r s t u v w x y z
language.DIC_DEVICE_NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE: Your box has lost its connection to the device. The content you were playing is no longer available. Please check that the device is still connected to your home network.
language.DIC_DEVICE_CONNECT_NOTIF: A new device has been connected to your home network. Press OK if you would like to explore this device now. Otherwise press BACK.
language.DIC_SEARCHING_EXISTING_NETWORK: Please wait while your Horizon box searches for existing networks
language.DIC_NO_DLNA_DETECTED_MSG:
There are currently no devices detected.
Select TRY AGAIN if you have attempted to connect a device. Otherwise, select CONTINUE and new devices will appear in MY LIBRARY when they are added.
Info: Try UPC Twonky application on your device, available FREE in My UPC.
language.DIC_WIZARD_START_MSG:
You can always run this setup process again from the HOME NETWORK SETTINGS menu.
Press OK to continue.
language.DIC_SETTINGS_NUMBER_RC_IN_STB_PAIRING_TA: NUMBER OF RCS IN STB PAIRING TABLE
language.DIC_SETTINGS_NUMBER_STB_IN_RC_PAIRING_TA: NUMBER OF STBS IN RC PAIRING TABLE

language.DIC_SETTINGS_MAX_NUMBER_OF_ENTRIES_MSG: Enter a new value value between 1 and 19
language.DIC_MCW_AUTH_PWD_SIZE_WEP64: WEP64 password shall be 5 ASCII or 10 Hexadecimal characters.
language.DIC_MCW_AUTH_PWD_SIZE_WEP128: WEP128 password shall be 13 ASCII or 26 Hexadecimal characters.
language.DIC_MCW_AUTH_PWD_SIZE_WEP: Password shall be 5 ASCII or 26 Hexadecimal characters.
language.DIC_NON_SELECTABLE_KEY_WARNING: YOUR SEARCH RETURNED NO RESULTS. PLEASE CHECK YOUR SPELLING, USE LESS SEARCH TERMS, OR TRY A NEW ONE.
language.DIC_TVGUIDE_ERROR_MSG: Program schedule loading in progress. It will be completed in a few minutes.

DIC_PVR_SETTINGS_MENU_CONTEXTUAL_HELPS.ITEM: At this menu, you can change the PVR Guard Time., At this menu, you can manage the PVR DD space
At this menu, you can change the PVR settings

DIC_SRV_MENU_CONTEXTUAL_HELPS.ITEM: In this menu, you can check the software version, initiate a download, and look up other system information.
In this menu, you can view smart card information and change the parental rating PIN.
In this menu, you can search for new channels or rebuild (refresh?) the channel list.
In this menu, you define the default channel for when you turn on your device.
In this menu, you define the time at which your STB
In this menu, you define how screen displays are shown and which display you have chosen.
In this menu, you can set up an check the Internet connection for interactive services.

DIC_UPGRADE_TEXTS.ITEM: Welcome to Sky, your new entertainment world
Sky bietet Ihnen mehr von allem, was Ihnen gefällt, z.B. einen neuen, wesentlich komfortableren Programm Guide:
> Die Sender praktisch nach Genre gelistet > Alle Sender auch in der Gesamtübersicht > Keine Optionen mehr, stattdessen echte Kanäle für Sport und Direkt
Bitte drücken Sie auf OK damit alle Sender in die Kanalliste integriert werden. Hierfür bitten wir Sie um 10 Minuten Geduld.
Mehr Informationen und eine aktuelle Bedienungsanleitung finden Sie im Internet auf:
Wir wünschen Ihnen erstklassiges Entertainment mit Sky.

language.DIC_ADJUST_TIMELINE_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to adjust timeline of the TV Guide grid view
language.DIC_FEATURED_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to discover Movies and TV Programmes picked by our experts

language.DIC_BOOT_LOADER_TEXT: Your box is being set up for you for the first time. Please wait a few minutes …
language.DIC_SEARCH_MORE_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Press OK to refine search by genre, channel or video format
language.DIC_CHANNEL_BAR_SUBSCRIBE_MSG: To view this channel, please press OK to subscribe to it
language.DIC_UPC_FORU_WATCH_RECOR_PROGS: Your suggested TV programmes - recorded and ready to watch now
language.DIC_UPC_FORU_AUTO_RECOM_GEN_EXPL: Get your suggestions automatically recorded for you. This way, you'll always have something interesting ready to watch!
language.DIC_OPT_OUT_OF_RECORDINGS: Would you like to stop automatically recording your suggestions?
language.DIC_SECOND_SCREEN_FIRST_INSTALL_MORE_INF: GET MORE INFO ON YOUR MYUPC ACCOUNT
language.DIC_SECOND_SCREEN_ERROR_OUTSIDE_COUNTRY: Content cannot be streamed outside of your country
language.DIC_SECOND_SCREEN_ERROR_LOGIN_CREDENTIAL: Your login credentials have been modified. You have to log in again.
language.DIC_SECOND_SCREEN_ERROR_PLAYBACK_PHRASE: In order to watch this video you need to change the streaming option in Settings
language.DIC_DOCSIS_CONNECTION_FAILED_MSG: Your DOCSIS cable modem is not functioning correctly
language.DIC_HN_SETTINGS_COMPLETE_MSG: Would you like to keep the new settings?
language.DIC_WIFI_DONGLE_CONNECTED: A Wi-Fi dongle has just been connected
language.DIC_RECORDING_CNCL_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Would you like to cancel the recording?
language.DIC_DELETE_APP_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this app?
language.DIC_WIFI_DONGLE_PELASE_CONNECT: Please insert your Wi-Fi dongle if you want to make this option available
language.DIC_LIBRAY_NOTIF__NO_SCHED_RECORDINGS: You don't have any planned recordings. You can set recordings via the TV GUIDE.
language.DIC_PROFILE_ENTER_PIN: PLEASE ENTER YOUR NEW PIN CODE
language.DIC_NO_TELETEXT_PAGES: There are no more teletext pages
language.DIC_UPC_FORU_RECOM_GEN_EXPL:
Horizon comes with a unique feature that provides a personalised entertainment experience. It can remember the programmes you’ve recorded or watched and use this information to recommend TV programmes, video-on-demand movies and TV series, as well as apps you may find of interest. You can easily turn personalised recommendations OFF or ON anytime within SETTINGS.
Viewing history is only used to optimise your entertainment experience; adult content will not be tracked or included in recommendations. We will not sell your data to third parties. For more details on how Horizon uses viewing history, please refer to the FAQ section in the Horizon Assistant or see our Privacy Policy. Would you like to activate the personalised recommendations?
language.DIC_REORDER_FAV_MODIFY_MSG: Select the channel you'd like to move

language.DIC_LIBRAY_NOTIF_NO_PHOTOS: There are no photos in your home network, or your home network hasn't been set up. You can set up a home network in SETTINGS.
language.DIC_CHANNEL_UNAVAILABLE_IN_REGION: This channel is currently not available in your region.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1001_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot complete the installation process. Please: -check your cables and connectors -or try installation again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1002_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot complete the installation process. Please: -check your cables and connectors -or try installation again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1003_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot complete the installation process. Please check your cables and connectors. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1004_PHRASE_2: Your {Client STB} is unable to connect to the {Gateway}. Please make sure: -your {Gateway} is properly installed and switched on -wait 5 min and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1005_PHRASE_2: Your {Client STB} and the {Gateway} are still setting-up. If installation is not complete in 5 min: -first make sure the box is switched on -then try installation again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1010_PHRASE_2: Your box has lost its connection. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 30 min -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1020_PHRASE_2: Your box has lost its connection. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 15 min -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1030_PHRASE_2: Please wait while your box establishes a connection. If installation is not complete in 15 min please: -check your cables and connectors -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1040_PHRASE_2: Your box has lost its connection. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 15 min -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1050_PHRASE_2: Your box has lost its connection. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 15 min and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1060_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot complete the installation process. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1070_PHRASE_2: Your box is unable to complete the installation process. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -wait 15 minutes -continue with the installation. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1080_PHRASE_2: Your box is unable to complete the installation process. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -wait 15 minutes -continue with the installation. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1090_PHRASE_2: Your box is unable to complete the installation process. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -wait 15 minutes -continue with the installation. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1100_PHRASE_2: Your box is unable to complete the installation process. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -wait 15 minutes -continue with the installation. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1110_PHRASE_2: Your box is unable to complete the installation process. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -wait 15 minutes -continue with the installation. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1120_PHRASE_2: Your box is unable to complete the installation process. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -wait 15 minutes -continue with the installation. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1150_PHRASE_2: There is a problem with the built in hard disk. Please restart your box using the power switch. If restart fails, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1160_PHRASE_2: There is a problem with the built in hard disk. Please try restarting your box. If restart fails, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1170_PHRASE_2: We were unable to update your PIN at this time. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -or try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1201_PHRASE_2: Connecting the {Gateway} via MoCA failed. Please: -check the connection -make sure the {Gateway} is on, and activated for {Client STB} installation -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1202_PHRASE_2: Connection to the {Gateway} using Wi-Fi failed. Please: -check your wireless connection via other devices -or select a different connection option -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1203_PHRASE_2: IP address from the {Gateway} failed to load. Please: -check the Ethernet cable is properly connected -confirm the {Gateway} network settings -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1204_PHRASE_2: IP address from the {Gateway} failed to load. Please: -restart the {Gateway} -wait for the MoCA connection to be restored. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1205_PHRASE_2: Failed to acquire valid IP address from {Gateway}. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -wait for the Wi-Fi connection to be restored. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1210_PHRASE_2: The {Gateway} is not responding. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1212_PHRASE_2: {Gateway} is not yet in {Client} installation mode. Please: -click CONTINUE > choose NETWORK SELECTION -on your {Gateway} select > INSTALL EXTRA MEDIA BOX -continue following the steps to complete the process. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1214_PHRASE_2: You’ve reached the maximum number of paired media boxes. To pair a new device, please: - select SETTINGS > UN-PAIR on your {Gateway} -disconnect one of the existing media boxes. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1216_PHRASE_2: Pairing the {Ziggo client device} to the {Gateway} has failed. Please: -check the {Gateway} is properly installed and switched on -confirm connection -wait 5 minutes and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1218_PHRASE_2: The {Gateway} does not recognize the paired {Ziggo client device}. Please: -check the {Gateway} is properly installed and switched on -confirm connection -wait 5 minutes and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1220_PHRASE_2: The Ethernet disconnected during installation. Please: -check your Ethernet cable is connecting the {Client} and the {Gateway} -try again, and installation will restart. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1222_PHRASE_2: The MoCA disconnected during installation. Please: -check your MoCA cable is connecting the {Client} and the {Gateway} -try again, and installation will restart. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1224_PHRASE_2: Wi-Fi disconnected during installation. Try reconnecting your Wi-Fi. If installation does not restart, please: -check the range of your wireless connection -or, use a network cable or MoCA. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_1200_PHRASE_2: Connection to Ethernet failed. Please: -check your cables and connectors -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -then try reconnecting. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_7010_PHRASE_2: Your box has lost its connection. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 15 min and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_7020_PHRASE_2: This app is (temporarily) unavailable. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -check the network connection -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_7030_PHRASE_2: This app is (temporarily) unavailable. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_7040_PHRASE_2: This app is (temporarily) unavailable. Please: -restart your box using the power switch on the back of the unit -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9911_PHRASE_2: Your box can't connect to your home network. To reconnect: -open SETTINGS > SET UP YOUR HOME NETWORK -select JOIN NETWORK -continue following the steps to complete the process. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9921_PHRASE_2: Your box can't connect to your home network. To reconnect: -open SETTINGS > SET UP YOUR HOME NETWORK -select JOIN NETWORK -continue following the steps to complete the process. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9941_PHRASE_2: Your box can't connect to your home network. To reconnect: -open SETTINGS > SET UP YOUR HOME NETWORK -select JOIN NETWORK -continue following the steps to complete the process. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9961_PHRASE_2: Your box can't connect to your home network. To reconnect: -open SETTINGS > SET UP YOUR HOME NETWORK -select JOIN NETWORK -continue following the steps to complete the process. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9970_PHRASE_2: Your box can't connect to your home network. To reconnect: -open SETTINGS > SET UP YOUR HOME NETWORK -select JOIN NETWORK -continue following the steps to complete the process. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3135_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, this category is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3140_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, the item you’re trying to access has been deleted.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3150_PHRASE_2: This recording is currently playing on another device, and cannot be deleted.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_2010_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, your box is unable to display TV channels at this time. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_2020_PHRASE_2: Your box has lost its connection. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 15 min and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_2022_PHRASE_2: Connection to the {Gateway} is lost. Please: -check your cables and connectors -verify the (Gateway) is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_2030_PHRASE_2: Installation is currently in progress. Thank you for your patience.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_2040_PHRASE_2: The connection between your box and TV is lost. Please: -make sure your TV is updated with the latest software -check the HDMI cable and settings on your TV -or switch to a SCART connection.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9010_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, there's a problem with the video, audio or subtitles you’ve selected. Please choose an alternative.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9020_PHRASE_2: The connection between your box and device is lost. To reconnect, please select your home network via SETTINGS. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9030_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, this content is no longer available.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9040_PHRASE_2: The connection between your box and device is lost. To reconnect, please select your home network via SETTINGS. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9050_PHRASE_2: The connection between your box and device is lost. To reconnect, please select your home network via SETTINGS. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9060_PHRASE_2: Your box is unable to complete set-up of the Home Media Catalogue. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_9070_PHRASE_2: The connection between your box and device is lost. To reconnect, please select your home network via SETTINGS. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3010_PHRASE_2: This programme cannot be recorded due to copyright restrictions.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3020_PHRASE_2: This series cannot be recorded due to copyright restrictions.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3030_PHRASE_2: Please enter a valid start and end time for this recording.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3040_PHRASE_2: You have planned the maximum number of recordings and reminders. To add more: -go to LIBRARY > delete an existing recording or reminder -then create a new one.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3050_PHRASE_2: You do not have a subscription to view this programme. Please contact Customer Service if you would like to upgrade your subscription.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3060_PHRASE_2: Your box has lost its connection with your TV. Please: -check the HDMI cable and settings on your TV -or switch to a SCART connection.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3070_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot read from its hard disk. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3080_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot access your DVR recordings. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3090_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot read its hard disk. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3110_PHRASE_2: Your box cannot read from its hard disk. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3120_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, your box is unable able to play back this content right now. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_3130_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, playback stopped due to a connection error. Please: -check your cables and connectors -verify the (Gateway) is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8600_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, this item is currently unavailable for recording.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_15_PHRASE_2: This recording was interrupted due to a scheduling conflict.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4001_PHRASE_2: Error code 4001: You (or someone) stopped this recording before it was complete.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4002_PHRASE_2: Error code 4002: You (or someone) stopped, then restarted, this recording.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4003_PHRASE_2: Error code 4003: This programme was scheduled to record after its start time. As a result, the beginning was cut off.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4005_PHRASE_2: Error code 4005: This recording was cancelled due to a scheduling conflict.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4010_PHRASE_2: Error code 4010: This recording couldn’t be completed due to a power failure.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4011_PHRASE_2: Error code 4011: Your hard disk is full. As a result, this recording was not completed.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4015_PHRASE_2: Error code 4015: This recording couldn’t be completed due to a scheduling conflict.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4016_PHRASE_2: Error code 4016: This recording couldn’t be completed due to a scheduling conflict.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4017_PHRASE_2: Error code 4017: You do not have access to record (or view) this programme. Please contact Customer Service if you would like to upgrade your subscription.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4021_PHRASE_2: Error code 4021: We’re sorry, due to a loss of connection this recording failed. Please: -check your cables and connectors -verify the (Gateway) is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4024_PHRASE_2: Error code 4024: We’re sorry, this recording could not be completed. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4025_PHRASE_2: Error code 4025: We’re sorry, this recording could not be completed. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4028_PHRASE_2: Error code 4028: We’re sorry, this recording could not be completed. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4030_PHRASE_2: Error code 4030: We’re sorry, this recording could not be completed. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4035_PHRASE_2: Error code 4035: We’re sorry, this recording could not be completed. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4040_PHRASE_2: Error code 4040: You’ve already recorded this programme.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_4045_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, this item is no longer available for recording.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_5010_PHRASE_2: Your account has been suspended. For more information, please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8500_PHRASE_2: Search is currently unavailable due to connection problems. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 15 min and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6010_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, your box lost its connection. Some features may be temporarily unavailable, but the issue will resolve itself. Thanks for your patience.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6011_PHRASE_2: Connection to the {Gateway} failed. Please: -check your cables and connectors -verify the (Gateway) is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6040_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6050_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6060_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6070_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6080_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6090_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6110_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6130_PHRASE_2: Your box and remote control are unable to connect. Please: -disconnect the power cable from your box -reconnect and verify the {Gateway} is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6200_PHRASE_2: The box is not able to complete the download process. Please: -check the connection to the {Gateway} -verify it is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6210_PHRASE_2: Pairing to the {Gateway} has failed. Please: -check the connection to the {Gateway} -verify it is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6211_PHRASE_2: Connection between the {Gateway} or {ZIGGO} has failed. -check the connection to the {Gateway} -verify it is powered on -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6212_PHRASE_2: The {Client} and the {Gateway} are not paired. Please: -verify the (Gateway) is powered on -go to SETTINGS on your {client box} > select FACTORY RESET. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6214_PHRASE_2: The {Client} and the {Gateway} failed to connect. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6216_PHRASE_2: The {Client} and the {Gateway} lost their existing connection. If the {Client} is not new, please: -go to SETTINGS on your {client box} > select FACTORY RESET. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6218_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, your network lost its connection. Please: -check the Ethernet cable is securely connected -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6220_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, your network lost its connection. Please: -check that your MoCA cable is securely connected to the {Client} and {Gateway} to the {Client} and the {Gateway} -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6222_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, your network lost its connection. Please try again. If this fails: -verify your Wi-Fi is within range -or use an Ethernet/MoCA network connection. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6224_PHRASE_2: The {Client} and the {Gateway} failed to connect. Please check the {Box} is properly installed and turned on. If this fails, verify your network connection, or try a different network configuration. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6226_PHRASE_2: The {Gateway} is not responding. Please check the {Box} is properly installed and turned on. If this fails, verify your network connection, or try a different network configuration. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6228_PHRASE_2: The {Client} couldn’t retrieve data from the {Gateway}. Please check the {Box} is properly installed and turned on. If this fails, verify your network connection, or try a different network configuration. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6230_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, the network lost its connection. Please: -check your Ethernet/MoCA cables are securely connected -or, verify your Wi-Fi is within range -then try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_6232_PHRASE_2: The un-pairing failed. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8015_PHRASE_2: ON DEMAND is currently unavailable. Please: -select RETRY to try again now -or EXIT, and try again later.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8020_PHRASE_2: Your box lost its connection. Please contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8030_PHRASE_2: This information is currently unavailable. Please: -check your cables and connectors -wait 15 min, and try again. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8040_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, ON DEMAND is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8060_PHRASE_2: Pause, fast forward & rewind are currently not available for this programme.You can enjoy this programme without these features.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8062_PHRASE_2: Playing this program is not possible at this time. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact Customer Service.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8070_PHRASE_2: We’re sorry, this item is no longer available. Either the viewing period has expired or your subscription has ended.
language.DIC_TECH_ERROR_8075_PHRASE_2: You do not have a subscription to view this content. Please contact Customer Service if you would like to upgrade your subscription.
